com.tmb.reports

Class ExtentReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tmb.reports.ExtentReport

  • public final class ExtentReport
extends java.lang.Object
    Perform initialisation and termination of ExtentReports After creating an instance for ExtentTest, it is delegated to ThreadLocal variable for providing thread safety. Jan 22, 2021
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Amuthan Sakthivel
    See Also:
    ListenerClass, FrameworkAnnotation

    • Method Detail

      • initReports

        public static void initReports()
        Set the initial configuration for the Extent Reports and decides the report generation path.

      • flushReports

        public static void flushReports()
        Flushing the reports ensures extent logs are reflected properly. Opens the report in the default desktop browser. Sets the ThreadLocal variable to default value

      • createTest

        public static void createTest(java.lang.String testcasename)
        Creates a test node in the extent report. Delegates to ExtentManager for providing thread safety
        Parameters:
        testcasename - Test Name that needs to be reflected in the report

      • addAuthors

        public static void addAuthors(java.lang.String[] authors)
        Logs the authors details in the authors view in the extent report. Gives an clear idea of Authors Vs Percentage success metrics
        Parameters:
        authors - Authors who created a particular test case

      • addCategories

        public static void addCategories(CategoryType[] categories)
        Adds the category a particular test case belongs to. Gives an clear idea of Group Vs Percentage success metrics.
        Parameters:
        categories - category a particular test case belongs to.
